summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. Initially, the road is clear with no immediate obstacles. As the vehicle progresses, a black sedan on the left side suddenly moves into the lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. Later, a large truck on the right side is overtaking the vehicle, moving ahead and occupying the lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed initially. Upon noticing the black sedans cut-in from the left lane, the vehicle decelerates to avoid collision. Subsequently, the vehicle maintains a safe distance from the truck overtaking on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving into the self-vehicles lane abruptly. 2) Right side: A large truck, approximately 10 meters away, overtaking the self-vehicle and moving ahead.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. A white sedan is seen on the left side of the road, and a motorcyclist is ahead in the same lane. The motorcyclist appears to lose control and falls onto the road, causing a potential hazard.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the motorcyclist. As the motorcyclist falls, the vehicle needs to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 2) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 15 meters away, falling onto the road, creating an immediate hazard.
